property.name: postsPerRow
property.label: Posts Per Row
property.description: When viewed on a mobile device, the row count will be stacked vertically.

property.name: useMetaData
property.label: Use custom metadata type values for content
property.description: If checked, use values from configured custom metadata type record and ignore all content/post IDs in property editor.

property.name: record
property.label: Record Name for the post URLs
property.description: Only applicable if using custom metadata type values for content.

property.name: variant
property.label: Variant
property.description: Sets the style of the component wrapper.

property.name: ariaComponentWrapperLabel
property.label: ACCESSIBILITY: Component Container ARIA Label
property.description: This sets the LinkedIn Feed component wrapper's ARIA label, for screen reader support. The component wrapper contains the header/subheader text (if configured) and the embedded LinkedIn posts.

property.name: ariaPostTitleLabel
property.label: ACCESSIBILITY: ARIA Title of iFrame Containing Post
property.description: This sets the title of the iFrame containing the embedded LinkedIn post(s), for screen reader support.

property.name: ariaUniqueIdLabel
property.label: ACCESSIBILITY: Unique Id ARIA Label Text
property.description: This sets the text placed before a unique id (GUID) appended to the ARIA component wrapper label and post title labels. This ensures unique ARIA labels/titles even if the component is used multiple times on the same page.
